column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Phenomenal! I'm vegan so most of my reviews regard wether or not there are vegan options and if they are good or not
column2: but Jinya has the most amazing vegan options and they even continue expanding them each time I go! The spicy creamy vegan is good
column3: but not spicy enough for my taste
column4: but they have great chili sauce on the side to add extra spice. The Flying Vegan Harvest is my absolute favorite
column5: but I get it without the beyond meat just because I'm not a fan. Also I love any of their cocktails so overall very satisfying experiences every time.
